title: 06/21/2021 - HOUR 2 - Colin Right Colin Wrong, Al Harrington, Country Club Clue
itunes:title: 06/21/2021 - HOUR 2 - Colin Right Colin Wrong, Al Harrington, Country Club Clue
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, it's another installment of Where Colin Was Right, Where Colin Was Wrong. Plus, retired NBA veteran Al Harrington offers his reaction to the narrowing NBA playoff field. Also, what should we make of Green Bay quarterback Aaron Rodgers renewing his country club membership in Green Bay?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
